decks.notes: The deck focuses on controlling the game by disrupting the opponent's strategy and removing threats using counterspells, removal spells like Path to Exile and Condemn, and board wipes like Supreme Verdict. The deck also aims to draw cards and generate card advantage with spells like Serum Visions and Ancestral Vision. Celestial Colonnade is used as a win condition once the opponent's threats have been dealt with. The deck also includes versatile planeswalkers like Jace, Architect of Thought and Gideon Jura to further control the board and protect the player.

The deck focuses on aggressively lowering your own life total to boost the power of Death's Shadow, while still maintaining control with disruptive spells like Thoughtseize and Stubborn Denial. Snapcaster Mage allows for additional value from instants and sorceries, while cards like Gurmag Angler and Tasigur, the Golden Fang provide additional threats. The deck aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent with efficient creatures and disruption, taking advantage of the powerful synergy between Death's Shadow and the rest of the deck.

This Modern deck focuses on utilizing the Death's Shadow creature and other efficient threats to quickly pressure the opponent's life total. The deck includes a mix of disruption, removal, and card draw to protect and support its aggressive game plan. By efficiently managing its life total and resources, this deck aims to control the board and disrupt the opponent's game plan while steadily reducing their life total to zero.

The deck focuses on quickly putting out artifact creatures and using them to swing for massive damage early in the game. It utilizes cards like Mox Opal and Cranial Plating to boost the power of its creatures, while also including burn spells like Galvanic Blast for additional damage. Steel Overseer and Signal Pest help to buff up the team, while Arcbound Ravager and Etched Champion provide protection and utility. The deck also includes land like Blinkmoth and Inkmoth Nexus to provide evasion and additional damage potential.

This Modern Eldrazi Aggro deck focuses on disrupting opponents with cards like Chalice of the Void and Thought-Knot Seer while quickly deploying powerful Eldrazi creatures like Reality Smasher and Matter Reshaper. The deck also includes ways to control the board with All Is Dust and Dismember, as well as ways to generate card advantage with Endbringer and Sea Gate Wreckage. With a solid mana base of Urza lands and Eldrazi Temple, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents with efficient threats and disruption.

This Golgari Aggro deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's hand with cards like Inquisition of Kozilek and Thoughtseize, while also providing removal with Abrupt Decay and Fatal Push. It aims to control the board with powerful creatures like Tarmogoyf, Scavenging Ooze, and Kalitas, Traitor of Ghet, and generate card advantage with Dark Confidant and Tireless Tracker. The deck also has some graveyard recursion with Eternal Witness and can grind out games with Liliana of the Veil. The lands provide flexibility and consistency to ensure the deck runs smoothly in a Modern 1 vs 1 format.

This deck focuses on quickly reducing your own life total in order to grow the power of Death's Shadow, a key threat that becomes larger as you lose life. With a suite of disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Inquisition of Kozilek, as well as removal spells like Fatal Push and Lightning Bolt, this deck aims to control the game while presenting a quick clock with Death's Shadow and other efficient threats like Snapcaster Mage and Gurmag Angler. The deck is designed to apply early pressure and disrupt opponents to secure a victory.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly deploy a wide board of artifact creatures and equip them with Cranial Plating to deal a significant amount of damage to the opponent in a short amount of time. The deck focuses on utilizing cards like Steel Overseer and Master of Etherium to buff up your creatures, while also using Arcbound Ravager to transfer counters and protect your key threats. With a mix of evasion from flying creatures like Vault Skirge and Inkmoth Nexus, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive plays and efficient combat tricks.

The deck aims to quickly ramp up mana using cards like Sakura-Tribe Elder and Farseek to cast Primeval Titan or Scapeshift. Once the combo pieces are in place, the goal is to trigger Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle multiple times in a turn to deal massive amounts of direct damage to the opponent, often leading to a game-winning play. The deck also includes removal and graveyard hate to help control the game and disrupt the opponent's strategy.

The main goal of this deck is to quickly reduce the opponent's life total by utilizing aggressive creatures like Goblin Guide and Monastery Swiftspear, while also dealing direct damage with burn spells such as Lightning Bolt and Lava Spike. The deck aims to maintain a fast and relentless pace, pressuring the opponent and forcing them to react defensively. Cards like Eidolon of the Great Revel and Searing Blaze punish opponents for playing spells or creatures, further advancing the aggressive game plan. Overall, this deck seeks to secure victories through quick and efficient damage dealing strategies.

The deck focuses on aggressive gameplay with a swarm of low-cost, high-impact Goblin creatures to overwhelm the opponent quickly. The key strategy is to flood the battlefield with Goblins and use cards like Goblin Grenade and Reckless Bushwhacker to deal massive damage to the opponent. The deck aims to capitalize on the synergy between Goblin creatures and maximize damage output through direct damage spells like Lightning Bolt. By maintaining a relentless onslaught of Goblins, the deck aims to quickly overpower the opponent and secure a victory.

The deck focuses on dealing quick and direct damage to the opponent, utilizing a combination of burn spells like Lightning Bolt, Lava Spike, and Boros Charm. The creatures, including Eidolon of the Great Revel, Goblin Guide, and Monastery Swiftspear, provide additional damage output and pressure. The mana base is built to support the low curve of the deck, allowing for consistent plays and quick victories by overwhelming the opponent with fast and aggressive plays. The deck aims to win within the first few turns of the game through relentless aggression and efficient burn spells.

This deck focuses on efficiently placing threats on the board while disrupting the opponent's game plan with removal and hand disruption spells. By leveraging powerful creatures like Tarmogoyf and Siege Rhino, along with Lingering Souls for extra value, the deck can quickly apply pressure and close out the game. The mix of creatures and spells enables the deck to adapt to different matchups and strategies, making it a versatile and competitive Aggro archetype in the Modern format.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize cards that enable a player to quickly lower their own life total, thus making Death's Shadow a powerful threat on the battlefield. By combining aggressive creatures like Death's Shadow and Gurmag Angler with efficient removal like Terminate and Fatal Push, the deck aims to apply pressure on the opponent early in the game. Additionally, the inclusion of cards like Thoughtseize and Inquisition of Kozilek helps disrupt the opponent's strategy, while cards like Snapcaster Mage and Kolaghan's Command provide additional value and flexibility.

The deck focuses on assembling a Creatures Toolbox by utilizing creatures with specific abilities that can be searched for and played at the right time to create powerful synergies and win conditions. The key strategy is to use cards like Birds of Paradise, Devoted Druid, and Vizier of Remedies to generate mana and combo off with cards like Walking Ballista or Kitchen Finks. Chord of Calling and Collected Company are essential for tutoring and casting key creatures at instant speed. The deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a versatile array of creatures and combo interactions.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly generate a large amount of mana through cost reduction effects from cards like Baral, Chief of Compliance and Goblin Electromancer, in order to cast a high storm count spell like Grapeshot or Empty the Warrens to deal lethal damage to the opponent. It also utilizes cards like Gifts Ungiven to tutor for key combo pieces and Past in Flames to recycle spells from the graveyard. The deck focuses on fast and explosive combo plays to overwhelm the opponent before they can react.
